birth_place.zh-cn: 英属香港九龙油麻地广华医院
birth_place.en: Kwong Wah Hospital, Yau Ma Tei, Kowloon, British Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物及法学家，中国国民党籍，曾任中华民国总统、中国国民党主席、台北市市长、法务部部长等职务。
description.en: A politician and jurist from the Republic of China (Taiwan), a member of the Kuomintang, who served as President of the Republic of China, Chairman of the Kuomintang, Mayor of Taipei, and Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统、台北市市长。在1998年台北市市长选举中被马英九击败。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President of the Republic of China and Mayor of Taipei. He was defeated by Ma Ying-jeou in the 1998 Taipei mayoral election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，接替马英九担任中华民国总统。曾在2012年总统选举中与马英九竞争。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who succeeded Ma Ying-jeou as President. She competed against Ma Ying-jeou in the 2012 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人、中国共产党中央委员会总书记，曾与时任中华民国总统马英九在新加坡会面。
description.en: The paramount leader of the People's Republic of China and General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, who met with then-President of the Republic of China Ma Ying-jeou in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党，马英九长期为其党员并曾担任党主席。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China, of which Ma Ying-jeou has been a long-term member and served as its chairman.

en: President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The office of the head of state of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党的最高领导人职位。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 台北市的最高行政首长。
description.en: The chief executive of Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院下辖的司法行政机关。
description.en: The judicial administrative agency under the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的综合性研究型公立大学。
description.en: A public comprehensive research university located in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university located in New York City, USA.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA.

description.zh-cn: 马英九的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 马英九的父亲。
description.en: Father of Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 马英九的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 马英九的长女。
description.en: The elder daughter of Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 马英九的次女。
description.en: The younger daughter of Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 马英九的大姐。
description.en: The eldest sister of Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。马英九曾担任其英文翻译。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President. Ma Ying-jeou once served as his English translator.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国外交家，曾推荐马英九担任蒋经国的英文翻译。
description.en: A diplomat of the Republic of China who recommended Ma Ying-jeou to be Chiang Ching-kuo's English translator.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长，邀请马英九出任法务部部长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Premier and invited Ma Ying-jeou to be the Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。马英九曾是其支持者，后因2000年总统选举败选而关系破裂。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President. Ma Ying-jeou was once his supporter, but their relationship broke down after the 2000 presidential election defeat.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾与马英九在2000年和2012年总统选举中竞争。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who competed against Ma Ying-jeou in the 2000 and 2012 presidential elections.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾在2005年中国国民党主席选举中与马英九竞争。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who competed against Ma Ying-jeou in the 2005 Kuomintang chairmanship election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾在2008年总统选举中被马英九击败。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who was defeated by Ma Ying-jeou in the 2008 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 一场反对马英九政府时期《海峡两岸服务贸易协议》的社会运动，期间占领了立法院。
description.en: A social movement opposing the Cross-Strait Service Trade Agreement during the Ma Ying-jeou administration, during which the Legislative Yuan was occupied.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国总统马英九与中华人民共和国最高领导人习近平在新加坡举行的会面，是1949年后两岸最高领导人的首次会晤。
description.en: A meeting between then-President of the Republic of China Ma Ying-jeou and paramount leader of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping in Singapore, marking the first meeting between the top leaders of both sides of the Taiwan Strait since 1949.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统马英九与中华人民共和国最高领导人习近平在北京举行的第二次会面。
description.en: The second meeting between former President of the Republic of China Ma Ying-jeou and paramount leader of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping, held in Beijing.

nodes.id: 台北市长马英九特别费案

zh-cn: 台北市长马英九特别费案

description.zh-cn: 马英九在台北市长任内因特别费使用问题被起诉的案件，此事导致他辞去国民党主席职务。
description.en: A case in which Ma Ying-jeou was indicted for issues related to the use of special allowance funds during his tenure as Mayor of Taipei, which led to his resignation as Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的私立大学，马英九卸任总统后于此担任讲座教授。
description.en: A private university in Taipei, Taiwan, where Ma Ying-jeou has served as a chair professor after his presidency.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍2024年总统选举候选人。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and the Kuomintang's candidate for the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，台湾民众党籍2024年总统选举候选人。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and the Taiwan People's Party's candidate for the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 指2024年中华民国总统选举前，中国国民党与台湾民众党之间的政党协商与合作尝试，马英九参与协调。
description.en: Refers to the political negotiations and cooperation attempts between the Kuomintang and the Taiwan People's Party before the 2024 Republic of China presidential election, in which Ma Ying-jeou participated in coordination.

description.zh-cn: 一项描述1992年两岸两会香港会谈成果的政治论述，马英九政府时期将其作为两岸交流的政治基础。
description.en: A political term describing the outcome of the 1992 Hong Kong meeting between the two sides of the Taiwan Strait. The Ma Ying-jeou administration regarded it as the political basis for cross-strait exchanges.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府为解决台湾、香港及澳门问题所提出的国家原则，马英九对此表示反对和无法接受。
description.en: A national principle proposed by the government of the People's Republic of China to resolve the issues of Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Macau. Ma Ying-jeou has expressed opposition and unacceptance of it.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任美国国务卿。2009年曾与时任总统马英九在萨尔瓦多会面。
description.en: American politician who served as U.S. Secretary of State. She met with then-President Ma Ying-jeou in El Salvador in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国卸任总统马英九首次访问中国大陆，进行祭祖和交流活动。
description.en: The first visit to mainland China by former President of the Republic of China Ma Ying-jeou for ancestral worship and exchange activities.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国卸任总统马英九第二次访问中国大陆，访问了广东、陕西和北京，并与习近平举行了第二次会面。
description.en: The second visit to mainland China by former President of the Republic of China Ma Ying-jeou, visiting Guangdong, Shaanxi, and Beijing, and holding a second meeting with Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 马英九于1968年6月正式加入中国国民党。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou officially joined the Kuomintang in June 1968.

description.zh-cn: 马英九毕业于国立台湾大学法律学系法学组，获得法学学士学位。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou graduated from the Law Department of National Taiwan University with a Bachelor of Laws degree.

description.zh-cn: 马英九于1977年获得纽约大学法学硕士学位。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou obtained a Master of Laws degree from New York University in 1977.

description.zh-cn: 马英九于1981年获得哈佛大学司法学博士学位。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou obtained a Doctor of Juridical Science (S.J.D.) degree from Harvard University in 1981.

description.zh-cn: 马英九于1977年与纽约大学同学周美青结婚。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou married his New York University classmate Christine Chow in 1977.

description.zh-cn: 马鹤凌是马英九的父亲。
description.en: Ma Ho-ling is the father of Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 秦厚修是马英九的母亲。
description.en: Chin Hou-hsiu is the mother of Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 马唯中是马英九的长女。
description.en: Lesley Ma is the elder daughter of Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 马元中是马英九的次女。
description.en: Kelly Ma is the younger daughter of Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 马以南是马英九的大姐。
description.en: Ma Yi-nan is Ma Ying-jeou's eldest sister.

description.zh-cn: 1981年，在钱复的推荐下，马英九返回台湾担任时任总统蒋经国的英文翻译。
description.en: In 1981, under the recommendation of Fredrick Chien, Ma Ying-jeou returned to Taiwan to serve as the English translator for then-President Chiang Ching-kuo.

description.zh-cn: 1981年，马英九担任时任总统蒋经国的英文翻译。
description.en: In 1981, Ma Ying-jeou served as the English translator for then-President Chiang Ching-kuo.

description.zh-cn: 在1998年台北市市长选举中，马英九击败竞选连任的陈水扁。
description.en: In the 1998 Taipei mayoral election, Ma Ying-jeou defeated the incumbent Chen Shui-bian.

description.zh-cn: 2000年国民党总统选举败选后，原属李登辉派系的马英九率先向李登辉逼宫，要求其辞去党主席职务。
description.en: After the KMT's defeat in the 2000 presidential election, Ma Ying-jeou, originally part of Lee Teng-hui's faction, led the charge to force Lee to resign as party chairman.

description.zh-cn: 马英九与宋楚瑜在2000年及2012年中华民国总统选举中为竞争对手。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou and James Soong were competitors in the 2000 and 2012 Republic of China presidential elections.

description.zh-cn: 在2005年中国国民党主席选举中，马英九击败王金平当选。
description.en: In the 2005 Kuomintang chairmanship election, Ma Ying-jeou defeated Wang Jin-pyng.

description.zh-cn: 在2008年中华民国总统选举中，马英九击败民主进步党籍的谢长廷。
description.en: In the 2008 Republic of China presidential election, Ma Ying-jeou defeated Frank Hsieh of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 在2012年中华民国总统选举中，马英九击败民主进步党籍的蔡英文。
description.en: In the 2012 Republic of China presidential election, Ma Ying-jeou defeated Tsai Ing-wen of the Democratic Progressive Party.

relationships.source: 台北市长马英九特别费案

description.zh-cn: 2007年，马英九因特别费案被起诉而辞去中国国民党主席职务。
description.en: In 2007, Ma Ying-jeou resigned as Chairman of the Kuomintang after being indicted in the special allowance fund case.

description.zh-cn: 2014年3月爆发的太阳花学运，主要诉求为反对马英九政府时期的服贸协议及两岸经济整合政策。
description.en: The Sunflower Student Movement, which broke out in March 2014, primarily opposed the Cross-Strait Service Trade Agreement and the cross-strait economic integration policies of the Ma Ying-jeou administration.

description.zh-cn: 马英九曾于2015年11月7日以中华民国总统身份在新加坡与习近平举行首次“两岸领导人会面”，并于2024年4月10日卸任后在北京举行第二次会面（“习马二会”）。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou held the first "Ma-Xi meeting" with Xi Jinping in Singapore on November 7, 2015, as the President of the Republic of China, and held a second meeting ("Xi-Ma II") in Beijing on April 10, 2024, after leaving office.

description.zh-cn: 2009年6月1日，在萨尔瓦多卸任总统的国宴上，马英九与时任美国国务卿希拉里·克林顿会面。
description.en: On June 1, 2009, at a state banquet for the outgoing president of El Salvador, Ma Ying-jeou met with then-U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton.

description.zh-cn: 马英九出席竞选总部成立大会，支持国民党2024年总统选举候选人侯友宜。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou attended the campaign headquarters establishment rally to support KMT's 2024 presidential candidate Hou Yu-ih.

description.zh-cn: 马英九作为见证人，参与并协调侯友宜与柯文哲关于2024年总统选举的政党协商。
description.en: As a witness, Ma Ying-jeou participated in and coordinated the party negotiations between Hou Yu-ih and Ko Wen-je regarding the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 马英九多次表示反对并无法接受“一国两制”方案。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou has repeatedly stated his opposition to and unacceptance of the 'one country, two systems' formula.

position.en: Yen Chia-kan Chair Professor of Law

description.zh-cn: 马英九卸任总统后，受东吴大学邀请担任严家淦法学讲座教授。
description.en: After his presidency, Ma Ying-jeou was invited by Soochow University to serve as the Yen Chia-kan Chair Professor of Law.

position.en: President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 马英九担任第十二、十三任中华民国总统。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou served as the 12th and 13th President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 马英九曾两度担任中国国民党主席。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou served as the Chairman of the Kuomintang on two separate occasions.

description.zh-cn: 马英九担任第二、三届直辖市民选台北市市长。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou served as the 2nd and 3rd popularly elected Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 马英九在连战内阁中担任法务部部长。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou served as the Minister of Justice in the Lien Chan cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 马英九在连战担任行政院院长期间，出任法务部部长。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou served as Minister of Justice while Lien Chan was the Premier of the Executive Yuan.
